CustomField.description: Users populate this optional text field with the SSN of the individual the account holder is dependent upon for the IRA Application for Individual Taxpayer Identification Number, usually their spouse.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the SSN of the account holder's spouse, or who they're dependent on for the IRA Application for Individual Taxpayer Identification Number.
CustomField.label: Form W7 Dependent US Citizen SSN
